title: Scream
plot: Scream: Directed by Matt Bettinelli-Olpin, Tyler Gillett. With Neve Campbell, Courteney Cox, David Arquette, Melissa Barrera. 25 years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, Calif., a new killer dons the Ghostface mask and begins targeting a group of teenagers to resurrect secrets from the town's deadly past.
